title: CorCraft: The Open Brain Project
description: With a background in bioengineering and electrocorticography, Dr. Ben Dichter (CatalystNeuro) now specialises in data and software engineering, working closely with labs to optimise data processing pipelines, improve research efficiency, and promote collaboration within the field of neurophysiology. Cortex Club is honoured to host Dr. Dichter for a hands-on workshop to analyse neuroimaging datasets using DANDI.
